original_title: First to Stand: the Cases and Causes of Irwin Cotle
overview: Irwin Cotler and his team fight for justice and human rights in the cases and causes of Raif Badawi, imprisoned Saudi blogger; Shaparak Shajarizadeh, champion of women's rights in Iran; Anatoly Sharansky, famed refusnik; and Bill Browder, creator of the most important human rights tool of this century.
title: First to Stand: the Cases and Causes of Irwin Cotle
